channel.title: Writeup on WeaponizedPeach >> Infosec
channel.description: Recent content in Writeup on WeaponizedPeach >> Infosec

item.title: TryHackMe: Mr Robot CTF
item.description: Intro This time we’re breaking a machine from the “Mr Robot CTF” room over on TryHackMe. Reconnaissance The room itself on TryHackMe does not give much to go on, apart from the fact that the machine itself is inspired by the show Mr. Robot. Scanning & Discovery RustScan I decided to use I’ve heard a bunch about - RustScan. It pins down open ports much more efficiently, cutting down the amount of time needed for, say, a full port scan on a box.

item.title: HackTheBox: Horizontall
item.description: Intro Welcome to my very first writeup! I am just starting out my infosec journey, and this box was my first ‘real’ challenge. Although it is rated ‘Easy’, I had to apply all of my current knowledge to snag both flags. Let’s crack straight into it! Reconnaissance Machine tags: Linux CMS Exploit Outdated Software CVE Injection RCE Account Misconfiguration The tags on the machine alone gives us a pretty good idea of what we’ll be up against.
